string.name: name
string.value: Knowledge About Dragons 1
You received the #t4161049#. #p1013000# seems to also be curious about its contents... Talk to #b#p1013000##k.
#p1013000# asks for you to read through the #t4161049# and tell him what it says. Read the book and explain it to #p1013000#.
Unfortunately, the book doesn't contain any information that pertains to #p1013000#. Maybe the #t4161050# has some information?
Master, master! You just got a book about Dragons, didn't you? Let me see it! Ugh... I can't read human letters. Please read it and tell me what it says!
I wonder what is written in it. I can't wait to hear about my race!
Huh? Don't you want to explain it to me? Fine, then can you teach me how to read human letters? This could take a while...

Master, master! Did you finish reading the book? Please tell me! What does the book talk about?
#b#L0#Dragon Culture#l
#L1#Dragon Attack and Defense#l
#L2#Dragon History and Traditions#l
#L3#Dragon Types and Characteristics#l
#k

Oh, Dragon Types and Characteristics? That's perfect! It'll tell me what kind of Dragon I am! Since you've read it, tell me what kind of Dragon I am master!
#b#L0#Blue Dragon#l
#L1#Gold Dragon#l
#L2#Black Dragon#l
#L3#Can't Be Known#l
#k

Huh? What do you mean can't be known... Why? Am I not a Dragon? What am I then, master?
#b#L0#Special Dragon#l
#L1#Wyvern#l
#L2#Drake#l
#L3#Alien Being#l
#k
Special Dragon? What's a special Dragon? Tell me more master!

Huh? This book doesn't contain information about special Dragons? It's in another book called Dragon Types and Characterics (Vol. II)? Master, let's go look for it! That book must contain information about me!
Dragon culture? That does sound pretty interesting, but I'm more interested about knowing what kind of Dragon I am...
Attack and defense? I know that stuff without having to read about it. I think it must be innate.
Dragon history and traditions... That sounds so boring... Yawn.
Blue Dragon? Hmm... I guess my scales are kind of bluish...but I don't have any ice attributes. Read the book again.
Gold Dragon? Only a really small part of me is gold. I don't think that's it, master. Read the book more closely.
Black Dragon! Is that what I am? Hmm... But there is a small part of me that is gold colored. That can't be it. Please read it more closely, master.
Wyvern? But Wyverns don't have any front feet. Am I a mutant Wyvern? Read it more closely master!
Drake? I don't think I look as dumb as a Drake... Really? Please tell me it's not true!
Ahhh, so was I an alien being all this time!
